idea:
The Company is engaged in the Facility Management business since January 2019, with the aim to provide professional services in Housekeeping, Cleaning, a blue-collar service provider like office boy, peon, pantry boy, HK boy, plumber, electrician, facility manager, and all services related to integrated facility management business. 

            The Founder of the company  Mr. Pawan Kumar has more than 12 years of experience in different fields of the industry. He had a good knowledge of Finance, Sales, and pest control industries. With this aim to make the environment clean and green he has started the company and continuously working on the same.

              We have many ongoing projects like corporates, Residential societies, Hotels, Hospitals, Schools, and many more.
